snippet: The Orion Pictures Corporation, the movie studio threatened by bankruptcy over a stack of late bills, has been hit with a $15 million state tax lien. "It is a precautionary measure to make sure, if any assets are sold or liquidated, the State of C...
lead_paragraph: The Orion Pictures Corporation, the movie studio threatened by bankruptcy over a stack of late bills, has been hit with a $15 million state tax lien. "It is a precautionary measure to make sure, if any assets are sold or liquidated, the State of California would be taken care of," said Jim Reber, a spokesman for the California Franchise Tax Board.

headline.main: Orion Pictures Is Hit by Tax Lien
